description:
Luxoft, the global IT outsourcing company providing software development services, opens the position in St.Petersburg 
 
Project Description:
  • One of the Top Investment Banks has a need to develop innovating margin risk platform which supports all major known and house margin calculation methodologies (VaR, SPAN, TIMS, FINRA, etc)
  • The successful candidate will take on an active role in build and release process of banking software and should have knowledge of software development life cycle, software configuration management practices, release management methodologies

Responsibilities:

  • Maintenance of source-code repository 
  • Maintenance of and enhancements to automated build, release and deployment infrastructure 
  • Troubleshooting server and application problems in cooperation with software engineers 
  • Creation and maintenance of build and deploy documentation 
  • Writing tools to automate various steps involved in release process

Skills Required:

  • Experience with an automated CI server required (Jenkins/Hudson, Bamboo, CruiseControl, etc.) 
  • Experience with Maven and Maven plugins required 
  • Experience with Unix/Linux systems. Scripting skills with bash
  • Experience with one of version control system (Subversion preffered) 
  • Basic knowledge of databases and SQL (Oracle preferred) 
  • Knowledge of groovy scripting is a plus 
  • Background in development / programming (Java preferred) 
  • Strong attention to details 
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills


Work conditions:

  • Salary rates will depend on the interview results+ social package (medical insurance, education, etc.)
  • We provide relocation package to St.Petersburg residents
